name: Lair Defense
description:
A rough little prototype exploring simple A* pathfinding and auto-battling. Place obstacles and enemies in the Heroes' path to stop them from progressing through the "dungeon".

No discrete win or lose states, use your best discretion.

Single click buttons and placements (don't click and drag) and place objects inside the walls.

Sprite assets created by Cainos, available for free on the Unity Asset Store.
